long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Job Tracker Chrome Extension, a simple yet powerful tool designed to streamline the process of applying for jobs on LinkedIn. We all know how overwhelming it can feel to keep track of numerous job applications, wondering if we've followed up, or even trying to remember all the roles we've applied for. That's where our extension comes in to ease the burden!

What It Does:
Our extension automatically captures essential details when you apply for a job on LinkedIn:

Job Title
Company Name
Date Applied
Job URL
It then neatly organizes this information into your Notion workspace, creating a personalized job application dashboard for easy tracking and follow-ups.

Steps to Integrate the extension

1) Download the template (Duplicate it into your notion workspace)
2) copy the Database ID (Database ID is the uniques id in the downloaded template url for example if the url is 

https://www.notion.so/9f8f1ff563c44f79e9c597965b82d61?v=fa1d619604084e62a86b4af687fee42c

The Database ID is 9f8f1ff563c44f79e9c597965b82d61 (section between the slash "/" and the "?"

 
2) Create a Notion Integration and Note Down the API key

3) Connect the downloaded template to the notion integration



Why You'll Love It:
Stay Organized: Keep all your job application details in one place.
Save Time: Forget manually entering data; our extension does it for you.
Track Progress: Easily monitor your job applications and plan your next steps.
We Need Your Feedback:
We're all about community and improvement. Do you have any features you'd love to see? Ideas for making job tracking even easier? I'd genuinely appreciate your suggestions and feedback.
